Name: Listen to Animals' Words: Translation of Cat's Language
Description: A strange researcher is trying to talk to cats through a special function of her Terminal...
QuestDesc: A strange researcher is trying to talk to cats through a special function of her Terminal...

Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Take it easy, little kitty. Your fur is so sparse. Are you an exotic breed?

Dialogues.Speaker: Hairless Kitten
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Meow! MEOW!!
Hey! How can you scold me when you don't even allow me to pet you! I can tell you're saying bad things about me, naughty kitty!
Let me use a translator to see what you're saying… Oops, the program crashed again.
Even though I've already optimized it... Seems like the Terminal still can't interpret this data. It's a hardware issue.

Options.PlotLineKey: Are you talking to a cat?

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Who? That's scary. You could at least say something before showing up!

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: …Well, forget about it. Are you that... that famous person? People have been talking about you lately.

Options.PlotLineKey: The first light here to save the world after the Lament.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hahaha, you're much more humorous than I expected.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I knew it!

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm Xuanyin, a citizen scientist. My patented invention is the Animal Language Translation Module, though it's still a prototype.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The animal language is frequency in essence, and all frequencies are data that can be interpreted. My Animal Language Translation Module is taking shape, and I've obtained unexpected information in experiments.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You must be interested in this kitty, so you struck up a conversation with me, right? Lucky you! I brought a Cat Language Translation Module today.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No, please wait! Let me finish this!

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Congratulations! You came in perfect timing!

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I heard that your Pangu Terminal is quite special, so I want to see if my module can also work on it. Can you let me try? Please! I'll definitely include you in the acknowledgments of my paper!

Options.PlotLineKey: Will it cause any harm to my Terminal?

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Please, give me a chance!

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Xuanyin loaded the Cat Language Translation Module onto your Pangu Terminal.

Dialogues.Speaker: Hairless Kitten
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Purr…

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I don't need a translation for this! I know what it means! It's content and saying thank you to us.

Dialogues.Speaker: Hairless Kitten (Translation)
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: SREVNAT! FSHI! LVEO! *garbled text*

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Uh-oh! The module is starting to throw errors. Seems like compatibility is still an issue. Anyway, let's uninstall it for now. I'm pretty surprised that it ran smoothly for this long.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Xuanyin uninstalls the Cat Language Translation Module from your Pangu Terminal and transmits the related data back to her.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The logic of my module is still straightforward. My understanding of Terminal Technology is no match for those officially trained researchers.

Options.PlotLineKey: It doesn't interfere with my understanding.
Now you know how to improve it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you. It took me a great effort to develop a module like this.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You're right. The most important thing for a scientist is trial and error. Great success is built on failure!

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you for helping me gather this data. I'll analyze it thoroughly and try to find a way to improve the module.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let's do it again sometime. I'll speed up the development of translation modules for other animals, and they'll surely blow you away, hehe!
